title: Ephesus Tours - Gather Some Crucial Information about the City (Catherin Moore)
text: By Catherin Moore Jul 24, 2015 Blessed with a glorious history, Ephesus, located in the Aegean side of Turkey, is said to be one of the most popular cities tantalizing the senses of a large number of tourists from across the world. If you are looking for the best destination to spend a memorable holiday or vacation, then this city actually welcomes you by letting you see many world heritages and they can do various enjoyable activities. Those who are a beach lover can definitely find this city as the most excited place for them as it is quite close to beach resort town, which is popularly known as Kusadasi. As mentioned above, Ephesus is known for its great history so it gives you a great opportunity to behold some popular historical monuments that can indeed make you amaze with their bizarre structures that are completely unique and spectacular. More and more, the most popular city of Turkey has large population (approximately 33,600 to 56,000). This is the reason why it is famous as the biggest and the highly populated region of the era. Apart from this, the city is also recognized as one of the seven churches mentions in the Book of Revelation. The history of this city is older than Roman or Greek times and those who visit here can see some remains from the Neolithic age. However, these remains certainly not offer you details about these periods. The city of Ephesus is also known for attractions such as Temple of Artemis and also The Celsius Library besides you grab opportunities to access numerous monuments to explore. It is not known to everyone that where the name of this city generally comes from. However, most of the people generally guess that the word 'Ephesus' derived from 'Apesas that clearly means 'bees' and also there are a large number of many bee symbols in the city area that actually justifies the opinions. Ephesus, today, became one of the wonder of the several wonders across the world, has been the most popular temple for a large number of Christens during several years. The city is also blessed with small house, which is quite popular among tourists as it is generally believed that it is the same place where the scared Virgin Mary spent the last time of her life. Today, it has become a highly famous church.
